divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were out on the porch and I looked up and saw a white sphere. I pointed at it and told him to look, when he had his eyes on it I went inside to get the video camera and two of our kids came out to see it. It was at first stationary and about the size of a pencil erasure at arm's length. It was about 70 to 80 degrees up and North of us. It moved towards the North East and at one point zig zagged as it went behind some trees. We moved to another area to try to find it again. When we spotted it seemed further away as it was smaller and continued to get smaller until none of us could see it any longer.
Summary: white sphere moved towards the northeast until too far away to see
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Prospect
There were no other sightings in Prospect on or around September 3rd 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
